events.name: Waveform Generation
events.desc: Your mission is to create a waveform in the CRO by using given components. The “Oscilloart” measures your creativity,and how faster you will accomplish the given task, in the given time slot.
rules: A team of maximum 2 members can participate.
The components will be provided.
Final decision will be taken by judges.
Any of the rule stated above can be changed or updated by the event coordinates and will be informed.

events.name: DRONE RACE
events.desc: The race comprises of 2 rounds. The first round tests the time of flight of all participating drones in the race pit and the best 5 will pass to the final round which is a head-on competition were the fastest flier will bag the prize.
rules: Each team can have a maximum of 2 members.
Each team should bring their own drone.
Drones should be in good condition.
The drone should be in the range of 45-70cm in diameter.
The drone must not be automated and must be controlled manually.
Pilots will carry a minimum of 2 batteries.
Pilots will carry their own battery chargers, charging points would be provided.
Pilots should bring their own soldering and other materials.
Pilots are allowed to bring their own launch pads to races.
All frames must pass a safety and airworthiness inspection. Once the airframe has been checked and approved, it must not be modified or changed, or it will need to be re-inspected.
Pilots will only use the circular antenna on quads and antenna must be in good condition.
Pilots must adhere to all rules within the competition venue, and will not fly in any other part of the venue unless it is a designated flight zone.
Pilots must arrive at the venue with their complete setup 1 hour before the official race time and must be in complete READY-TO-GO state 15 mins before race time.

Pilots will NOT be given any practice sessions during the 15 mins before the race starts. Pilots who are not in READY-TO-GO state 15 mins prior to race time will be disqualified from participating in the race.
Participants have to control their drone and cross the obstacles in the path and complete the circuit.

Pilots will be given maximum of 3 chances in the Qualifier Rounds, by which pilots have to record their best lap time. In that 1 round is mandatory while 2 rounds are optional if the pilot is happy with his/her lap time in any of the 3 rounds max.
Top X number of pilots (where X is dependent upon the number of attending pilots) based on their fastest time set in the Qualifiers will proceed to the final Round.
Once pilots have successfully completed all laps, they must return to the start/finish pad, land and DISARM.
Pilots that have crashed at any point during their race, are unable to resume racing, must DISARM their aircraft and wait until all aircraft have landed to retrieve their aircraft.
Participants should follow the instructions. If anyone fails, they will be disqualified from the event.
The decision of the judges will be final and no one can object their decision.
